files.description: Package initializer for the meta-analysis starter-kit demo modules.
End-to-end runnable script that loads a toy CSV, performs a meta-analysis, and writes pooled estimate tables, a forest plot, and logs into outputs/ and _build/.
Implements core meta-analysis computations (effect sizes, random/fixed effects pooling, heterogeneity stats) used by the demo runner.
Utilities for reading the toy input CSV, validating schema, and writing standardized CSV/JSON outputs into the canonical folder structure.
Generates at least one saved figure (forest plot) from computed meta-analysis results and writes it to outputs/figures/.
Centralized logging setup that writes detailed run logs to _build/logs/ and echoes concise progress to stdout.
Toy study-level dataset CSV used by the demo to produce real pooled estimate outputs and a figure.
Documentation with examples showing how to run the demo script and where to find the generated outputs and logs.
Project configuration declaring dependencies (numpy, pandas, matplotlib, scipy) and an entry point for running the demo.

missionDescription: Create and run an end-to-end meta-analysis starter-kit demo that generates real saved analysis outputs (at minimum: pooled estimate table + one figure) from a toy CSV, and writes outputs + logs to the canonical /outputs and _build/ structure. This directly fixes the '0 analysis outputs' gap and operationalizes goal_28.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Deliverables audit reports 0 analysis outputs. Even with templates and stubs present (prereg/scope memo), the program needs a runnable pipeline producing numeric outputs and figures to close the implementation loop.
projectName: and run an end-to-end meta-analysis starter-kit demo that generates real saved analysis outputs (at minimum: pooled estimate table + one figure) from a toy CSV, and writes outputs + logs to the canonical /outputs and _build/ structure.
